remarks: Specialization of absmuld with ~ absidd .  (Contributed by Stanislas Polu, 9-Mar-2020.)
statement:
absmulrposd.1 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
absmulrposd.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
absmulrposd.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
absmulrposd $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( A x. ( abs ` B ) ) ) $.
